name: OG: Virus
description:
OG is for Old Game. I made this game with GameMaker 6 when I was about 12. (I updated it a few times, but this release I finished when I was 12)

Hit the switches and shoot the enemies! You swap places with basic enemies when you shoot them, and have other effects on other enemies.

TitleVirusEstimated Release Date2007My Age at the Time12EngineGameMaker 6.0

This actually includes a 3D cutscene at the end too (although due to graphic driver changes or something, some of the sprites are a bit off).

I dare you to post some of your old games, add the "og" tag, and link to them in the comments below.
